inserts.gw_summary: Major payment gateway, view more at PayPal.com.
inserts.gw_instructions: Visit the PayPal website and login, click the History tab, a dropdown will appear. Select the IPN History option. If your IPN settings are turned off, you will be prompted at the top with a link to Turn on IPN. The Donation Tracker requires PayPal's IPN to be turned on. Although not required, if you need to provide a url, use the following in the notification url setting: %gateway_url%

inserts.gw_summary: Fill in details for how members can send an offline donation.
Major payment gateway, view more at Payza.com.
inserts.gw_instructions: Visit the Payza website and login, click the main menu tab, a dropdown will appear, click the IPN Advanced Integration link. Now find and click the IPN Setup link, you will need to enter your Transaction PIN to access this area. Once in, make sure the IPN Status and Enable IPN Version 2 settings are enabled. In the Alert URL setting, enter the following url: %gateway_url%

inserts.gw_summary: Major payment gateway, view more at Skrill.com.
inserts.gw_instructions: Skrill requires a secret word be setup in the merchant tools section of the Skrill website. Once your secret word has been setup, you need to paste it into the below Secret Word field. Click here to view Skrills own FAQ on this.
inserts.gw_fields: [{"id":"1","name":"secret_word","desc":"Please enter the secret word you setup in the merchant tools section of the Skrill website.","langbit":"gw_secret_word","type":"input","options":""}]

inserts.gw_summary: Payment gateway, view more at http://www.paymentwall.com/.
inserts.gw_instructions:
Pingback URL: %gateway_url%

Click here for instructions on how to setup this gateway.
